results.t: New Zealand Stock Exchange (NZX): Meaning, How It Works ...

results.p: New Zealand Exchange Ltd is located in New Zealand and is regulated by the The Financial Markets Authority (FMA) and NZX Regulation Limited (NZ RegCo).

results.t: New Zealand Stock Market (NZX 50) - Quote - Chart
results.p: The NZX 50 is a headline stock market index which tracks the performance of 50 largest and most liquid companies by free float market capitalization.
